name: request-validation-generator
description: Generates negative request validation Playwright tests (missing required, type mismatch, union oneOf violations) in QA suite format.

scripts.generate: npm run generate:raw && npm run format && npm run lint:generated
scripts.generate:full: npm run fetch-spec && npm run generate:raw -- --deep && npm run format && npm run lint:generated
scripts.generate:smoke: npm run generate:raw -- --max-missing=2 --max-type-mismatch=3 && npm run format && npm run lint:generated
scripts.lint:generated: eslint generated/**/*.ts || (echo 'Lint errors in generated output' && exit 1)
scripts.regenerate: npm run fetch-spec && npm run generate && npm run format
scripts.sync:full: npm run build && npm run generate:full && npm run sync:tests
